sources.title: All At Sea
sources.description: All at Sea is a 1977 Australian television film about a group of misfits on holiday on an island resort. Not great resolution but quite watchable.  Kind of an Australian take on Benny Hill or the Adventures of British comedy.

metadata.Plot: All at Sea is a 1977 Australian television film about a group of misfits on holiday on an island resort. It used the cast from The Celebrity Game.
metadata.Actors: Johnny Pace, Michael Preston, Joe Martin
